original_text: The Lord God made many wild animals. But the snake was the most clever of them all. The snake asked the woman, ‘Did God say, “You must not eat the fruit from any tree in the garden”? Is that really true?’
korean_text: 그런데 뱀은 여호와 하나님이 지으신 들짐승 중에 가장 간교하니라 뱀이 여자에게 물어 이르되 하나님이 참으로 너희에게 동산 모든 나무의 열매를 먹지 말라 하시더냐

sentences.original_text: The Lord God made many wild animals.
But the snake was the most clever of them all.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 뱀은 그들 중 가장 지혜로웠다.

sentences.original_text: from any tree in the garden"?
